articles.author: Jamie Gangel and Whitney Wild, CNN
articles.title: US Secret Service providing personal cell phone numbers of agents to oversight entities
articles.description: Personal cell phone numbers of US Secret Service agents have been provided to oversight bodies looking into the January 6, 2021 attack on the US Capitol.

articles.title: Sen. Manchin explains why he changed his mind on massive bill - CNN Video
articles.description: CNN's Jake Tapper asks Sen. Joe Manchin (D-WV) why he agreed to sign onto Sen. Chuck Schumer's bill on taxes, healthcare and the climate after earlier signaling he would not support it.

articles.title: How the climate bill could save you money on electricity, cars and appliances

articles.title: Nebraska and Colorado are sparring over water rights. It could be the new norm as rivers dry up
